TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {1918=The ICR was Hunter's original comerical remote. It was sunset in 2011 to make way for the RoamXL, which offers a longer range and rugged body design. The RoamXL is recommended as the replacement for current ICR owners looking for a replacement. All ICR models are warrantied for five years from the manufacturing date code.}
textBeforeTable: ICR Model Chart Models The ICR was Hunter's original comerical remote. It was sunset in 2011 to make way for the RoamXL, which offers a longer range and rugged body design. The RoamXL is recommended as the replacement for current ICR owners looking for a replacement. All ICR models are warrantied for five years from the manufacturing date code.
